name: The Adventures of EnviroStar!
description:
she protecc

she attacc

but most important

she brings healthy climate bacc

The environmental studies sim/RPG you never knew you needed.

Made by people who never thought they'd make one, for that matter.

**SAVING IS NOT SUPPORTED IN THIS VERSION**

You may get a benign error popup if playing on Safari - you can ignore and continue (only tested in Chrome)

Please don't use the web client save states  function it is untested and may cause crashes!   

This is not the final version!  There will be additional sounds and uh, the ability to save/go back because whups hit the deadline.
